attributes.action: 60%: That is the Governments Take for each litre of fuel paid for
attributes.additional_details:
60%.

That is what the Government takes from us on Every litre of fuel we purchase.

Stop blaming the oil companies for not passing on the falls in oil prices: it does'nt matter how low oil prices fall, the Government will still take its 60%!

Adding insult to injury, expect another 4p/Litre increase: its just around the corner...
